name: KKR & Co. Inc.
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. is a leading global investment firm founded in 1976 and headquartered in New York. The company specializes in alternative asset management, including private equity, credit, real estate, infrastructure, and hedge funds, serving institutional and individual investors worldwide. KKR is recognized for pioneering the leveraged buyout model and continues to be a major player in the financial services sector.
